TextView.android:text: 1)A, P, R, X, S and Z are sitting in a row. S and Z are in the centre. A and P are at the ends. R is sitting to the left of A. \n Who is to the right of P ?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n Explanation:- The seating Arrangement is as follows

2)There are 8 houses in a line and in each house only one boy lives with the conditions as given below: 
 1.Jack is not the neighbour Siman. 
 2.Harry is just next to the left of Larry. 
 3.There is at least one to the left of Larry.
 4.Paul lives in one of the two houses in the middle. 
 5.Mike lives in between Paul and Larry. 
 If at least one lives to the right of Robert and Harry is not between Taud and Larry, then which one of the following 
 statement is not correct ?

RadioButton.android:text: A)Robert is not at the left end.
B)Robert is in between Simon and Taud.
C)Taud is in between Paul and Jack.
D)There are three persons to the right of Paul.

TextView.android:text: View Answer
Answer : Option C

3)A, B, C, D and E are sitting on a bench. A is sitting next to B, C is sitting next to D, D is not sitting with E who is on \n the left end of the bench. C is on the second position from the right. A is to the right of B and E. A and C are sitting \n together. In which position A is sitting ?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n Explanation :- Therefor, A is sitting in between B and C.

4)Five girls are sitting on a bench to be photographed. Seema is to the left of Rani and to the right of Bindu. Mary is to \n the right of Rani. Reeta is between Rani and Mary. \n 1. Who is sitting immediate right to Reeta ?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n Mary is sitting immediate right to Reeta.
5)Who is in the middle of the photograph?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n Explanation:Rani is in the middle of the photograph.
6)Who is second from the right?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n Explanation: Reeta is sitting second from the right.
7)Who is second from the left in photograph ?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n Explanation:Seema is sitting second from the left in photograph.

8)Six friends are sitting in a circle and are facing the centre of the circle. Deepa is between Prakash and Pankaj. Pritiis between Mukesh and Lalit. Prakash and Mukesh are opposite to each other.\n Who is sitting right to Prakash?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n Explanation:Hence, Lalit is sitting right to Prakash.
9)Who is just right to Pankaj ?
View Answer
Answer : Option A \n Explanation:Hence, Deepa is sitting just right to Pankaj.
10)Who are the neighbours of Mukesh?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n Explanation:Hence, Priti and Pankaj are the neighbours of Mukesh.

11)Six friends P, Q, R, S, T and U are sitting around the hexagonal table each at one corner and are facing the centre of the hexagonal. P is second to the left of U. Q is neighbour of R and S. T is second to the left of S. \n Which one is sitting opposite to P ?
View Answer
Answer : Option D \n S is sitting opposite to P.
12)Who is the fourth person to the left of Q ?
View Answer
Answer : Option A \n P is the fourth person to the left of Q.
13)Which of the following are the neighbours of P ?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n T and R are the neighbours of P. \n
14)Which one is sitting opposite to T ?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n Q is sitting opposite to T.

15)In an Exhibition seven cars of different companies - Cadillac, Ambassador, Fiat, Maruti, Mercedes, Bedford and Fargo are standing facing to east in the following order : 
 1.Cadillac is next to right of Fargo. 
 2.Fargo is fourth to the right of Fiat. 
 3.Maruti car is between Ambassador and Bedford. 
 4.Fiat which is third to the left of Ambassador, is at one end. 
 Which of the cars are on both the sides of cadillac car ?
View Answer
Answer : Option C \n Fargo and Mercedes are on both the sides of cadillac car.
16)Which of the following statement is correct ?

RadioButton.android:text: A)Maruti is next left of Ambassador.
B)Bedford is next left of Fiat.
D)Fiat is next second to the right of Maruti.

TextView.android:text: View Answer
Answer : Option A \n Therefore, Maruti is next left of Ambassador.
17)Which one of the following statements is correct ?

RadioButton.android:text: A)Fargo car is in between Ambassador and Fiat.
B)Cadillac is next left to Mercedes car.
C)Fargo is next right of Cadillac.
D)Maruti is fourth right of Mercedes.

TextView.android:text: View Answer
Answer : Option B \n Therefore, Cadillac is next left to Mercedes car.
18)Which of the following groups of cars is to the right of Ambassador ?
View Answer
Answer : Option B \n Mercedes, Cadillac and Fargo cars are to the right of Ambassador.
19)Which one of the following is the correct position of Mercedes ?

RadioButton.android:text: A)Next to the left of Cadillac
B)Next to the left of Bedford
D)Fourth to the right of Maruti.

TextView.android:text: View Answer
Answer : Option D \n The correct position of Mercedes is fourth to the right of Maruti.
